name: Complete Nourishing Hair Oil Shine Drops
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Oil
about: What it is:A silicone-free, weightless, multitasking hair oil that reduces frizz, hydrates, protects against damage, and quickly leaves a high-shine finish..Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Concerns:- Frizz.Key Benefits:- Instantly leaves a high-shine, silky finish.Highlighted Ingredients:- Hemisqualane: Superior to silicone, it improves hair health and strength rapidly and over time..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:Give hair lustrous shine in seconds. These emollient pink-hued drops enhance hairs shine, thanks to hibiscus extract, which imparts a prismatic effect in the blink of an eye while providing deep nourishment for hair that looks lit from within..Fragrance Description:Sparkling grapefruit and tangerine are infused with white florals, soft violet, and sweet honey notes..
ingredients: -Meadowfoam Esters: Add instant shine and lock in hydration for glossy, reflective strands..-Hemisqualane: A silicone alternative that improves hair health and strength..-Hibiscus Extract: Provides antioxidant protection from damage and color fading...Hydrogenated Farnesene*, Squalane, Jojoba Esters, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Meadowfoam Estolide, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Flower Extract, Eclipta Prostrata Extract, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Fragrance/Parfum, Coumarin, Amyl Cinnamal, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydroxycitronellal, Methyl Ionones, Eugenol, Linalool, Limonene. *Sugarcane Derived Hemisqualane...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Dispense a few drops into palms and rub together before smoothing down damp or dry mid-lengths and ends to tame frizz and add shine..Recycling Instructions:.-Please refer to your local recycling center for guidance on how to recycle.                                                                                                                                                                                        -Glass bottle: 100 percent infinitely recyclable. .-Dropper: post-consumer-recycled..-Outer packaging: FSC-certified with soy-based ink.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This oil is one of the first, true weightless oils that Ive come across! Instant shine, hydration and detangling - however, like others have said, the results last only a few hours and the smell is simply meh. I wouldve looked past the longevity if the smell was amazing, but either way, very good product and I wouldve looked past buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine curly high poorosity hair in an extremely humid climate. This oil is amazing. My hair is shiny, bouncy, and looks fantastic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product after I wash my hair and every three days. I love the smell and how it makes my hair feel. I will recommend it to everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It gives your hair instant moisture and shiny (not greasy) appearance but it doesn't last long. After a few hours my hair looks back how it was. It's not terrible and the hair doesn't look worse. But I was looking for a product that worked more as a treatment and not a quick fix.   I will keep using it but unsure if I'd repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been using it every time I have my hair dried after freshly washing it, and have noticed my hair has way less frizz. My curls are shiny and healthy. I find myself leaving conditioner out of my routine since using this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this for my sister, who has 3b curls, and it absolutely works! I couldn't help but notice her hair looking more succulent lately, and its all thanks to this product!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am sharing my honest and authentic opinion, as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador. I like using this product after styling with heat. I put a few small drops in my hands and rub together until warm. I apply to the midsection to ends of my hair for a polished look that is lightweight and not greasy. It does not weigh down my thin hair. I am not in love with the scent, but it is not a deal breaker for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Use as the finishing touch to my hair routine every day. Gives my hair great shine and prevents my hair from becoming dry throughout the day. Love this stuff

reviews.review_title: Solid lightweight oil that lasts a long time
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: 2 drops for my 2A hair work wonderfully after I have air dried or heat styled my hair. Adds lovely shine and frizz, humidity protection without weighing hair down. For best results, use a leave in conditioner before this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this product didn't absorb into my hair. first tried a small amount, which did nothing. later, I tried double that, which did nothing. tried a little more and yep no difference.  My hair is fine so I found this very strange. Generally this amount causes my hair to look oily enough to rewash so I am surprised that didn't happen
It's a very watery oil and the smell is not good.. : (

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! It leaves your hair silky and smooth without making it oily! Perfect product to finish your blow out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Light-weight, beautiful hair oil.  I can use this everyday on my hair.  Its super affordable and very high quality.  Makes hair look glossy and nourished without weighing it down or leaving a residue.  Great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not a big fan of oils but love this. It takes about 30min-1hr for my hair to fully absorb the oil. It does look greasy and  stringy while waiting for it to absorb. The smell is sweet and earthy due to the jojoba and sunflower oils!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A lightweight beautifully scented hair oil for everyday. Will not weight hair down and Provides high shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It smells terrible I dont see any change in my hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was able to use to product 4 times before posting this review. So far, I find that this is a great treatment product for my fine, thin, color treated hair. This smelled earthy to me and I knew that I would be washing my hair after the 10-15 minute treatment time but I liked the smell. Before I started using this, my hair color was fading. With use my hair color looks refreshed, cuticles of my hair look smooth with lots of shine. Hoping that with longer use, my hair strands will be stronger and less breakable in new growth and hair already in place. Scalp feels good also and not oily. I would like this in a spray type application as I feel that it would be easier than the oil to reach to entire scalp and strands of hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! It smells amazing and it is the perfect oil to use for breaking the cast. It is lightweight and does not leave the hair feeling oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Truly lightweight! Great finishing oil for mid length to ends, I run left over across crown to add shine. Smells like Smarties candies! If you usually find hair oils too heavy, try this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell of this oil and once you apply it you can see the difference it makes. It makes my hair look shiny and vibrant!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't like it. It smells terrible. I do not recommend it. My hopes were disappointed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! Makes my hair shiny and not greasy. Lasts a long while

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I generally avoid finishing oils or glosses like the plague as they usually just leave my fine hair looking greasy but this absolutely does not. Adds a beautiful shine and sense of weight to my otherwise poofy, static-prone hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this product after blow drying and it makes my hair not frizzy at all. The smell is also amazing. The only thing is that I feel like a little bit goes a long way and if its over done then my hair will look oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Found it too heavy for my thin fine hair, even with one drop. Just looked instantly greasy. Had to return unfortunately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this. No silicone means no frizz and crispiness. Does what it says with an easy to control dispenser. Super shine and not heavy.I've tried all the others, Kerastase and Moroccan Oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really doesnt do much for my hair other than make it greasy. It doesnt absorb too well and seems to just sit on top of the hair itself. I was hoping for more of a hydrating, softening and shine oiloildidntget that from this oil

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried some of this in store and my hair immediately looked so smooth and silky and it also felt super soft I was shocked. I also really love the smell I cant explain it but its super good and also subtle. So I waited for the sale and I purchased it and love it so much! reviews.review_text: I love this product. I have hip length fine but thick hair. One drop of this with one pump of the Kristin Ess working serum is my holy grail combo! It adds just the right amount of shine when used sparingly. Work from the bottom of your hair up focusing on the tips and use the rest on bangs and flyaways. Ive had this for two years. Itll last forever and its pretty on the counter too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love all the other JVN products Ive tried, but I dont like this one. The consistency is watery and it makes my hair flat and greasy. I typically like hair oils with a thicker consistency that dont take the volume and freshness out of my hair. I wont be repurchasing this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

absolutely terrible. i used it as intended and everytime i do, it makes my haire so greasy its terrible. if you have light fine hair do not purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin

Love this product! Gives the perfect healthy shine

Overall, I would buy it again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brunette hair

reviews.review_title: So glad I switched to this oil!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this oil! After using Olaplex #7 bonding oil for over a year I was out and looking for a different one. I love that this oil is silicone free which I was told was good for my extensions. It smells good and leaves my hair so soft and shiny and I feel like it actually helps to repair my hair and not just sits on it.  I come home from work and take my hair out of the pony tail and it's so soft. The only negative is that I have to be careful applying it to the thin layers at the top of my head because if it sits on top or my scalp it leaves it looking really oily. Other than that I highly recommend it!!!

reviews.review_title: I wanted to like this product.

reviews.review_text: This is my go-to hair oil after diffusing my 3B curly hair. gives me shine and reduces frizz. scent isn't over-powering. been using this for about a year now and it doesn't disappoint.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a staple piece in my hair routine. I tend to have frizzy hair after washing and even styling so this product definitely helps tame that flyaways as well as bring so much shine to your locks! I absolutely love the smell too :)

Because its a dryer oil, work in small sections to avoid wasting product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This oil has become my go-to product for when I need to control my frizzy waves. I love that all I need is a little drop and that it doesn't weigh down my hair! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: Everyday Shine: My Must-Have Hair Oil
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It's such a versatile product. I wear it at night after washing my hair, after giving my locks a nice blowout, or even just for touching up my curls throughout the day.   The moment I run a few drops through my hair, there's this immediate transformation u2013 a soft, radiant shine that just feels healthy. Plus, unlike some other oils, this one is so lightweight. No greasy after-feel, no heaviness; it's as if my hair just soaks it right up.  Beyond the shine and feel, I appreciate how effortlessly it fits into different parts of my hair routine. Whether I'm prepping for bed, heading out the door post-blowout, or just giving my curls a mid-day refresh, this is my go-to.  For anyone on the fence, or if you're like me, always in search of that genuine, no-fuss product that delivers consistently, I'd say give the JVN Nourishing Hair Oil Shine Drops a whirl. It's been a delightful addition to my haircare arsenal, and I think you might just fall in love with it too!

reviews.review_title: Actually works for shine and healthy looking hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I dont give 5 stars lightly but this stuff earned them! I have fine hair on which I recently did a silver transition. I never would have thought that using an oil on my fine, temperamental hair would make it look fuller and more beautiful but this stuff is a miracle worker! Heres my process. I use Jessicurl Spiralicious Gel and Briogeo Blossom & Bloom Ginseng + Biotin Volumizing Spray as styling products. After I put these products in, let them sit while doing my makeup and squeeze the water out of my hair, I put two drops of this miracle oil on my hand and rub it on my palms thoroughly. Then I evenly distribute it from the mid-lengths to the end of my hair as evenly as possible. Et voilu00e1! All of us who have challenging hair know that its never just one product or technique that makes hair great. Its a combination of things. But, when I use this JVN Complete Nourishing Hair Oil Shine Drops, my hair goes from good to AMAZING in only 2 drops.

reviews.review_text: I feel like I had my hopes a little too high for this product. It doesn't make much of a difference with shine, it does not help with frizz, and the smell is very overpowering. I was so excited to try a JVN product, but this one was so disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Complete Nourishing Hair Oil Shine Drops works wonders on my long hair. To use, simply apply a couple drops into the palm of your hand and apply to your hair at mid length to the ends, apply more if needed. This should be used as the final step of styling- after you have washed and conditioned your hair, and after drying with a towel. It does have a distinct floral scent so I would recommend only using what you need and not over-doing it. These drops give my hair the natural moisture and nourishment that it needs and I love that it has the Sephora Clean Beauty Stamp.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this oil as I needed a bit of shine and u201coomphu201d for my hair in the cold dry winters. This product is perfect for me! Its lightweight (my hair isnt coarse or thick so oils weigh it down), smells wonderful, and adds the perfect amount of shine. If youre looking for a super moisturizing and taming oil, this is probably too light for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I experienced what a couple others did, where my hair just looked oily and greasy, even though I hardly used anything.   The applicator isnt for me either.  Im always worried Ill drop it.

The smell is subtle and reminds of shampoo, so it also helps me pretend like my hair is clean. A little goes a long way, otherwise it looks oily if you use too much.

reviews.review_text: I have been using this oil for a few weeks now. I've found that it's more effective when applied to dry hair rather than damp hair. It's very lightweight, non greasy and doesn't cause breakouts around the hair line. I didn't notice any fragrance. I applied it to my hair after flat ironing and it gave it a nice shine. If your hair loses shine throughout the day, I suggest applying a few drops to refresh the shine.

All in all, Ill use the rest of the bottle however I wont be purchasing these.

reviews.review_text: I' am very surprised with this product, it has become an essential part of my routine. I even use it when I just wash it, when it dries naturally I add two drops and it looks amazing for my day (Without blow) and many people ask me what I did to my hair that day and the truth is that I only used those magic drops... I'm already using my second bottle!!! So definitely recommend, 10/10u2026

reviews.review_text: The packaging is very high end and the bottle and applicator are apothecary in style, I love it! The scent is very mild and the application is straight forward. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Nourishing Shine Drops are great for second day hair. My wavy hair tends to look a little fluffy in the mornings and the shine drops help to tame my hair. A lot of other shine products contain silicones which leave a slippery layer on my hands, make the top layer of my hair look almost too shiny but are very hard to spread evenly throughout the hair.   The shine drops have a runny & water like consistency, are lightweight, and dont feel greasy on my hands or hair. They add a nice natural looking shine to my hair, help to reduce frizz, and tame flyaways. I love that the scent smells natural, is very subtle, and doesnt clash with other scented hair products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a bottle of these shine drops free for a review and Ive fallen in love with this line. From the glass bottle and dropper to the amazing scent this has easily become one of my favorite ways to add a little shimmer to my hair. I have fine hair so anything added to my hair after it dries really shows up and really can be weighed down by anything u201cextrau201d. Not with these drops!! I drop a few in my palm and run through my hair and the shine is noticeable but no extra added weight! The light scent doesnt overpower or cover the scent of my shampoo/conditioner combo nor the perfume I wear. Absolutely perfect! Highly recommended to add some shine to your hair!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is awesome! At first, I was a bit hesitant because usually hair oils are super greasy, hard to determine how much is the right amount, and end up making you look like you havent showered for a few days. For the first time ever, that was not my experience. Take that with a grain of salt, though, because I rarely use hair oils, so my sample size is small, to begin with. However, I think the main player here is the hemisqualane. In general, squalene is a fantastic and great naturally occurring hydrocarbon (oil) that is biologically similar to the oils that humans naturally produce. They took it to the next step, though, and put hemisqualane which is a more stable and fully saturated hydrocarbon which makes it easier to emulsify and makes it act similar to silicone while still being an all-natural ingredient. The shine this product add is the perfect amount; your hair feels hydrated, and the frizz is gone. I use 1-3 drops depending on how much moisture I need, and I'm good to go. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

Ive told all my family and friends about it. You need this in your hair routine! Ive been trying not to use heat on my naturally frizzy hair and this stuff makes my hair look shiny and straight with just a few drops.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ill re purchase this product for the scent alone, Im obsessed! But my hair feels and looks incredible after using this, a staple in my routine post shower or anytime I need a refresh! Im 3 months in and have Barry made a dent, a little goes a long way truly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Made my hair so dry. So strange given that I was thinking it was gonna go on greasy. Definitely not for me. Im gonna stick with Moroccan Oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells AAHHmazing, I'll even rub some on my arms too sometimes.  Love this for scrunching out the crunch on my fine wavy/curly hHai or smoothing fly ways on blown out hair. I appreciate it is silicone free and a lighter weight oil, but is still an oil product so only a drop or two will be enough for fine hair and stay away from the roots.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In my last order on Sephora, I got a sample size of this product. I normally dont use hair oils since I dont like the greasiness and the look of it on my hair, but this product is totally different from what I had before. Its been 3 times that Im using it and it totally fixed my hairs dryness. After shower, I use 2 to 3 drops on my almost wet hair, then I brush it through my hair and massage it. It gives shine, detangles my hair, prevents it from breaking and it actually rejuvenates my fizzy dry hair and it smells lovely. I love it and I am definitely buying the full size. I wish I knew this product before cutting my dried out long hair. I could have saved them with this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a pretty standard hair oil but Im obsessed with the smell. Its not very overpowering but it just smells like a hair salon, which I love. I have dry, frizzy wavy hair and this adds nice shine however it doesnt control frizz. A little goes a long way, it can make my hair look greasy if Im not careful. If youre familiar with the Oaui and Verb hair oils, I would say its a similar consistency to the Oaui one and that the Verb oil is thicker. Because of how little product you need to use, I think its a much better value than the Oaui one. I wont go out of my way to repurchase this but I think its a good option if you want to try a new oil!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the smell of this. I didn't like how oily my hair looked after using this. Maybe I used too much. I did try it again with less and my hair was still looked greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is really good! More of a dry oil than I anticipated. The texture is really lovely, oily but not thick or greasy. It gives really good shine and helps with frizz. I have pretty damaged hair on the the ends and this really helps it look healthier. There isnt really a scent to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVED LOVED LOVED! Super light weight...very moisturizing! Perfect amount of fragrance...not too much. I'm amazed at how mine & my daughters hair feels. Shine without the weight!! Definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin

I only had to use a couple drops for my hair. & I have long, thick hair. I personally don't use hair oils or anything similar. So I won't go out of my way to buy this product. Everybody is different though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't LOVE the product but I absolutely had no issues with it. My hair was a touch sheener but my hair is picky and it did make my hair a little gross.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm in love with this product!! The scent is not overpowering, as well as my hair feels and looks so much better!!No more frizzy hair days for me!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Product is an excellent oil for adding shine. Smells amazing and packaging looks/feels expensive. I only applied the oil to mid length and ends, but it didn't not make hair greasy or overly oily. Great for creating a sleek/shiny finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that such a little bit goes a LONG way!  The scent draws you in with a light hint of floral deliciousness!  It leaves my chemically treated hair soft, shiny and much more manageable without leaving a greasy  look, which happens due to my fine hair.

reviews.review_title: Leaves hair shiny and smelling good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

I received this product from Influenster and JVN in exchange for my honest review. My dry bleached hair loved this one! Its light-weight, doesnt make my hair greasy and doesnt weigh it down. These are foolproof and would work really well for fine hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The oil feels very lightweight and absorbs without leaving a residue. The smell is reminiscent of the old herbal essence shampoo which I loved but it does have a strong smell for those that are sensitive. I used it to tame the day two and three frizzy hairs or whenever I need a little refresh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love this product smells amazing, feels amazing, leaves a natural shine to my hair without it feeling greasy made my hair healthier!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Solid product that hydrates and adds shine to your hair. It's lightweight and easy to use. I wish it were also anti-frizz with heat protection. Otherwise, it's a great product and I recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I dont think that I noticed significant long term changes but it did feel nice when I would put it on. I wont buy again . I did receive this for exchange for an honest review

reviews.review_text: I received the JVN Complete Nourishing Hair Oil Shine Drops for free from Influenster in exchange for my honest opinion. I was really impressed with this hair oil! The scent is really nice and the formula was very light and did not weigh down my hair or make it look or feel greasy. It works really good for taming flyaways and left a beautiful shine to my hair! Make sure to follow the instructions and only use one or two drops to ensure you get a nice shine that doesnt look greasy! I will definitely continue using this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging of this shine drops is nice and easy to get the product using the dropper. It's very lightweight and it helps make my hair shiny once i apply it (after drying). I love the subtle floral scent and using this with the pre wash oil is a good combo. Oh and it's vegan and cruelty free as well which is awesome!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My go-to hair oil over the years has been The Ordinary's Squalane. But this! JVN Hair uses hemi-squalane so you get all of its benefits but without the heaviness. It's so lightweight on the hair! This oil increases shine while decreasing flyaways and frizz. The only negative I could find was the scent. Other have complemented the fragrance but it's just not appealing to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed these drops. They left my hair shiny and soft. They also have a nice smell to them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I ABSOLUTELY love the shine these nourishing drops give my hair. Ive got lots of silver, and this just really makes them glow. While I received this free to try, I will keep purchasing for the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

It is lightweight and makes the hair still have plenty of volume. I highly recommend using for extra protection when hair is wet before blow drying. It helps tame the frizz without weighing down! Thanks INFLUENSTER for letting me try for free!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It has a mixed of floral & citrus scent thats mild. I have fine straight hair, so I tried 1 drop for a start on my mid-ends & didnt notice much, perhaps a little shine.  I add 1 more drops, so 2 drops total & my hair looks shiny, but also oily & flat, what a bummer.  I think this will works better for thicker or curly type hair, since with my hair type, I can only use a very small amount which make the result hardly visible.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wish I liked it more but just made my hair very very oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin

Highly recommend to anyone looking for a lightweight shine serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: JVN complete nourishing hair oil shine drops work well on my hair & on my daughters hair too. I was sent a bottle in exchange for my honest review. You will want to use these drops like a smoothing finish after you style your hair. We only needed about 2-4 drops (depending on how thick and long your hair is). This gave both of our hair a pretty shine. I was also happy to see that the price was reasonable too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the packaging, the glass bottle and dropper is sleek and practical. I like that I can dispense as much as I want with the dropper. I have thin, fine, straight hair and its taking some time to figure out how much I can use and not look oily. I love the smell, its soft and delicate. I find this works well when I use it on damp hair and only at the ends and an extremely small amount for my hair type. I cant wait to try it in the winter to help when my hair becomes dryer. You get a lot of bang for buck as well, a lot of product in my opinion. I would definitely recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received these shine drops for my honest review. I love the smell, the silky oil-free gloss adds shine without weight and greasiness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have pretty frizzy hair, and its especially frizzy after washing and drying. Ive been using this oil shine drops for the past month, and it works really well. Doesnt leave my hair oily, it takes care of frizz, and it smells amazing. I love when my hair smells really nice.

reviews.review_title: Tames the frizz + subtle healthy shine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these shine drops. I have very long, thick hair with considerable split ends (I own it). Frizz and flyaways are real. I apply just a couple of drops of this to my ends when my hair is dry. Initially, it feels a bit like the drops add some grease or stickiness to my hair but that goes away. This product makes a big difference in how my hair looks. I get compliments! The only thing I really don't like is the smell. It reminds me of bad public bathroom cleaner. But it's subtle so whatever, you don't smell it once it's on.

reviews.review_title: Solid option for a weightless shine oil
reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this item for free from Influenster in exchange for a free review.  The Nourishing Shine Drops were nice! It took a tiny amount if product to cover my hair. I mainly added to my ends. I did enjoy this product, but there are other products give similar results. These products are between $20-30, so theyre pretty affordable and will last a long time, so if youre in need of a weightless shine oil, this is a good one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product. The smell is light and crisp with out being over bearing. The shine it leave is super nice and drys down well. Theres no build up with this product which I definitely appreciate

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: JVN Complete Nourishing Shine Drops smell really great and are light weight. These work really well with my thin hair. They tame frizz and also adds shine. I am definitely purchasing this after my bottle finishes up. A little bit of product goes a long way, therefore it's going to last a while. I recommend this to all hair types.

reviews.review_title: Adds Beautiful Shine To Your Hair...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product because it adds beautiful shine to my hair. It is lightweight and it smelled heavenly. My hair doesn't feel greasy, which has the perfect consistency. A little goes a long way so give it a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised with this oil! Normally I get nervous putting oil in my hair because I feel like it always ends up looking greasy. To avoid that I try to use oils/serums while my hair is still wet but this oil can only be used in dry hair. Using it on my dry hair didnt make it look greasy at all! The oil is very lightweight and added a nice shine to my hair without added weight or the look of grease. It also helped to tame some fly aways too. This is now incorporated into my everyday hair routine because its easy to use and gives my hair a little extra something!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: At first glance these hydrating and glossifying hair drops look very appealing to the eye in its packaging. With a very modern and sleek bottle, and a very precise dropper. Not only does it look good, but it does amazing things for your hair! Its so light weight, you dont even feel like its oil in your hair. The fragrance is amazing and last days after applying to your hair. The drops are supposed to nourish and shine, and thats exactly what it does. It gives your hair a more healthy and refreshed look, with also making you hair soft and smooth. This is definitely a product Id use again, and for sure a line Id purchase from.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from influencer in exchange for my honest review. I am constantly trying to find the perfect products for my hair. I have hair that goes to my butt and I always blow dry and straighten it. With that comes some damage and unfortunately a bit of frizz. I enjoy these shine drops a lot. They definitely help maintain the frizz with some added shine. And a little goes a long way. I also enjoyed that it didn't weigh down my hair or make it look greasy which is always a plus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use a ton of hair oils, so when I received this from Influenster for my review, I wasnt expecting it to be totally different. However, the consistency of this oil is so thin, the smallest amount rubbed in my palms and gentle applied to my totally dry and styled hair just brings it to life! Not greasy, its actually weightless and gives my blonde hair high shine and dimension! If too much is used I could see how this could make hair greasy, but truly a tiny amount like two or three drops is enough for my whole head! Will last me a while, so the value is definitely there!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These drops have a strong clean floral scent from the bottle, which reminds me of Biolage shampoo. I place a few drops in my palm, rub my hands together, and then run them through my dry hair.The scent doesnt linger on my hands, it's mostly gone in a few minutes.I like to use this lightweight oil when my hair is feeling a little frizzy and dry to tame static and add shine. My hair is really long (waist length) and fine. I use a couple of droppers full, one dropper per half head. I hate going to get the ends chopped off. The shine drops help me feel better about the time in between trims.  I received this product as a free sample.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product!! It combated frizz and made my hair so silky without adding weight. My toddler poured most of it down the toilet and I cried. It is fabulous!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try these shine drops because I love JVNs personality and mission and noticed that they include hemisqualane, which I have purchased several time from The Ordinary for use on my bleached/highlighted hair. I go the beach a lot and wanted a more natural hair oil that does not contain silicons or other products that would discolor my hair in the sun and salt water. These are best applied to dry hair, focusing on the ends, and fit every quality I wanted! And they smell great & are priced nicely. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Full disclosure - I have dry and extremely frizzy hair. I used to get Brazilian blowout regularly but I have stopped doing that since past 3 years so I'm looking for products that help me nourish and tame my hair.  I tried JVN nourishing shine drops and I used these sparingly as they might weigh my hair down. It helps with containing some fly always and I liked the smell. It added shine but don't think it helped in nourishing my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these JVN nourishing sunshine drops! Theyre so lightweight and smell great. The price point is perfect and I love supporting a founder who truly has everyones best interest at heart. I will be rebuying this product and Im excited to try out the rest of this lines items.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and JVN in exchange for my honest review. I actually really like these. My hair is thin and often a bit frizzy, and I find that a single drop helps smooth everything out and give me a shine boost. It's not super heavy or greasy, and it doesn't make my hair feel gross to the touch.

reviews.review_title: Best Yet, Even on Very Strong Hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! First drops that have ever worked in my hair!  I have super thick, course, mid back, very strong hair. Before or after my wild gray days, including colouring, Ive never found a hair oil thats really done anything. A few drops of this in my waist length hair, adds shine and revitalizes it instantly. Tried it on hair where the colour and shine from the dye really faded. Shiny as the first day I coloured it.  I love the scent. Very feminine and gentle. I have to return the two other JVM products I bought. The scent is too strong. Thankfully, this one is a keeper. :-)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While I wanted to love it, it wasnt for me. It added shine, sure. But my hair never felt moisturized when using it. The smell is amazing, so I attribute to more of a u201chair perfume.u201d None the less, I was impressed with the entire line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received these to try and enjoyed that the scent wasnt very strong. Im Not used to having to use after care products on my hair so this is just a so-so for me. Usually I wont touch my hair after I style it because it gets mad. (Naturally curly hair in Michigan and Floridas  heat and humidity.) I have to apply it gently so my hair doesnt poof out. It does the job, but I find that I have to wash my hair faster because my hair looks dirty/oily within a couple of days.   If you wash your hair more often and your hair doesnt get mad when you touch it, this is for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free for testing purposes. I love the unique scent of the product, that was my first comment after using to my husband u201coh, smell my hair, I love the scentu201d , he agreed. I also love the anti frizz factor, which I think works well. The drops made my hair look a little oily where applied, there were very few instructions on use ( which I think needs to change).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this! Use sparingly or youll look like a grease bomb, as with any oil product. Smelled good too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have really long hairs and always excited to try new products. It is really light formula which makes hair shine hydrated and soft. There is ease in using as with dropper we have hold on how much product we are using. When I received to test I was really excited and really used it at least 15-20 days before giving my review.its rightly priced too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: JVN Complete Nourishing Shine Drops is one of those products that can make your hair beautiful. The directions specify to put this on once the hair is completely dry. For best results either use a microfiber towel to dry your hair or let it air dry. It smells good almost like a rose; within a few days after use my hair still smells amazing. Doesnt feel greasy and it feels smooth. I have tried this for almost a month and I got to say that my hair has never looked so beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try this. I had heard all the hype about JVN and wondered, ya know?  Anyway, I got these and first off the smell!  It is to die for. So sweet but not overly so. The oil was a little too much for my hair though.  Using on dry hair just weighed my hair down. One drop on damp hair worked a lot better.  Overall, Id probably buy again if I was looking for this kind of product.  But with how little I need on my hair, that day wont come for a LONG tome

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These shine drops were my favorite  When used very sparingly this oils give a weightless gloss to your hair.  A little goes a long way for me, ( little past my shoulders length hair) one dropper full was plenty! Also the packaging is beautiful and completely reusable after the product is used up. I love packaging that doesn't add to waste.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved the shine and smoothness these drops added to my hair. I have long, colored hair that is definitely dry and tends to get frizzy. While these drops were not miracle workers they did add a wonderful shine. The smell was faint and quite lovely too. Also the dropper really allows you to  control how much product you get! Wonderful add! I am not sure they did much for frizz in the long term, but overall I was happy with the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a nice addition to my hair care routine. I found it softly scented, smoothing my frizz and making my hair look healthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I received the JVN Complete Nourishing Shine Drops complimentary to test and I think this is a great splurge. A little goes a long way if you have fine or short hair, just two drops is more than enough to give it a great look. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am super happy I got these JVN oil shine drops because I have overly colored/bleached/and styled hair and I have been searching for an oil to try and soften my hair and bring its shine back! As with any oil product I worry about it weighing my hair down but these drops really didnt do that, with that being said a little does go a long way so I started with a small amount and rubbed mostly on my ends and in the middle of my hair (which is the most damaged) and then I added just 1-2 more drops for the top of my head and it seemed to be the perfect amount. After using these drops for several washes I really did notice my hair felt softer and looked shinier. My dried ends looked a lot better and were much more manageable! I didnt have as much frizz on the top of my head from fly aways. The smell of the oil drops is just perfect, there is no other way to say it. They have a scent of Tangerine and florals with a hint of sweetu2026its just lovely. The bottle itself is small and is $22 online but again a little goes a long way so I feel like this will last a long time. Overall, these drops are great and have really improved my hair. I highly suggest giving them a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been looking at different hair oils, even though I didn't really need one. I shower at night and use this as a sort of finishing product in the morning. My hair is pretty healthy (no heat usage and weekly hair treatments), with the only salon treatment I have done is a gloss with toner to cancel out the warmth. I didn't think that this product would do much, with even my hairdresser commenting that there's not really anything else I could do to make it look better, but I was proven wrong! Not only does this add more shine to my hair (as it states it would do), but it does not weigh it down or make it look greasy in any way! I have medium-coarse black hair that is mostly straight except for the ends (from air drying), and I've found that it works best for me to apply three drops to my palm, rub my hands together, and then disperse through the mid length to my ends and go through the twice, with one finishing drop for my ends specifically. I have applied too much before (an entire full dropper throughout my whole head, adding even more after that), but my hair did not look greasy, just shinier. I don't think you can really go wrong with this product, and it looks amazing especially after you've used a deep conditioning mask and your hair is smoothed down. It'll last you a pretty long time, as I use about a dropper a day, and after having had this for a month there's barely a dent in this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I normally don't write bad/negative reviews, because I understand that just because something doesn't work for me, doesn't mean it won't work for someone else. This hair oil actually damaged my hair. I've inserted a picture with this review just so you can get an idea of what type of hair I have. The picture of my hair that is attached to this review is NOT what my hair looked like when using this product. In fact, I did NOT have this product in my hair at all in the picture I attached to this review. Unfortunately I was stupid and forgot to take a picture of what my hair looked like while using this product. Just take my word for it, it was HORRIBLE! I have thick, curly, frizzy, long hair. My shortest layer is 16in and my longest layer is 20in. As thick and curly as my hair is, I thankfully don't have a lot of tangle/knot issues. I'm pretty much always able to run my fingers/comb/brush through my hair with ease. Well, I used the JVN Hair Oil and it left a REALLY sticky, thick residue on my hair that made it tangle/knot up REALLY bad. I thought maybe I didn't wash the shampoo/conditioner out of my hair that well and the hair oil was not getting along with it. So a few days later I washed/conditioned my hair and rinsed really well. Put the hair oil in and the same thick/sticky residue made it tangle/knot up REALLY bad. Again, I tried to give the benefit of the doubt and chock it up to user error, and maybe the hair oil wasn't getting along with my leave in moisture product. So a few days later I washed/conditioned, rinsed really well and only used the JVN Hair Oil. Again, the same thick/sticky residue that made my hair tangle/knot. The tangles and knots were SO bad from the hair oil that it actually damaged my hair. The thick/sticky/tacky residue made it so hard to run a comb/brush through my hair to try to get the tangles/knots out that it actually started breaking my hair off, and not from the root. My hair was breaking off mid shaft!!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This oil is awesome! It is extremely lightweight and leaves my hair soft and silky. I have oily fine hair, and this is the first oil I try that doesn't weigh down my hair. It is good for controlling frizz, and it has a light scent that I prefer instead of heavily perfumed products. I would 100 % recommend it to anyone with fine hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine hair, and when used on the shaft to ends (post blow dry) the product gives bouncy shine and smooths the little flyaways. I use literally 4-6 drops spread evenly over my hands so I dont over-do it, which is very easy on my hair type. Any remaining product on my hands I pat down my scalp and get the crown flyaways. The smell is what I can only describe as light, pleasant, and reminds me of the smell of fancy hair salons. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this hair oil! It is the perfect finishing touch to make my hair look sleek and shiny but not oily. Cant recommend enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Does nothing special. The scent is not appealing either. Dont waste your money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the scent and this makes my hair look so good! I always worry about using an oil on my fine thin hair but this works great. I will definitely repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Def adds shine, but not a nutritious oil, doesnt soak into my hair just kind of sits on top. Will probably only use after styling hair but thats about

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: it's amazing! Iu00b4ve tried so many hair oils before and this one is the only one that leaves my hair exactly how I like it! it gives the perfect shine to my hair and it doesn't look oily after. 100000% recommend!   #jvnhair #jvn

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these shin drops, Smells super good and very lightweight doesn't weight down my super fine hair just don't put to much and avoid the roots. I apply to my hair after it's dry or styled and it makes my hair feel soooooo soft, healthy and helps with frizz. def recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I dont dye my hair and I have fine hair. My scalp can get easily oily but I have dry ends. I love the smell of this and how light this is. I love that I can put the in and its shy and doesnt weigh my hair down. I put this in only set to get that shine that I want.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells pleasant and it made my hair look soft and healthy. It didnt hydrate my hair that much but Id still buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I struggle with coarse and wavy frizzy hair. This helps smooth my hair without weighing it down. even argan oil can be too tacky, making my hair difficult to brush and leading to more breakage. This oil glides and is without silicone.  I'll likely buy this again to keep as a staple when my bottle is low.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very light oil. It doesnt weigh my hair down or feel sticky like other products I have tried. It smells nice but isnt overpowering. Would purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, this oil stinks. I simply cannot get past the smell. Second, it just sits on your hair. It does add a little bit of shine, but it does nothing to tame/soften/smooth/nourish your hair like other oils. Even using a minimal amount, it still managed to leave a slightly greasy film on my hair. I regret buying it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product does what it says. I received a deluxe sample and then bought the full size. Considering how little you use (just a few drops for my fine, long straight hair) the full size is huge. I expect itll last a long time. As for the results, it makes my hair instantly so shiny. I always wondered why I couldnt get my hair as shiny as Taylor Swifts (haha) and now I can. I wash my hair 2-3 times a week and use this every day on dry hair to add shine and revive styled curls. Im not sure how hydrating it really is alone but it looks great and reduces my light frizz on my ends. I just make sure to use other hydrating products as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this several times more. After using this product my hair felt more dry and prone to tangles. I do not like it.  I have used this product many way -after styling, damp, dry, overnight. It really provides no benefit other than an overcoat of shine so if thats all you want. Just dont expect any lasting benefit. I wouldnt buy again in fact considering actually returning it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've loved all of my JVN products to date, and was excited to try the Shine Drops. Unfortunately, I was disappointed with the results of this one. I followed the application instructions, however my hair turned out looking stringy and greasy, not shiny. And after trying a few times, I kept getting the same results. The only thing I liked was the scent. Maybe I'll try it on the ends of a ponytail, just to get rid of it. But, I won't be purchasing again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In love with this product! Nice light smell and a very light weight oil that adds gorgeous shine to your hair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The fragrance is light and clean. My hair doesnt feel weighed down when I run it through my hair. I love the way my fly aways are tamed and it makes my hair look sleeker. I also find that my hair feels softer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Oily! didnt like it. weighs the hair down. Ill back to moroccan oil light or bumble and bumble dry oil

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I definitely notice less shedding in the shower and less flyaways / frizz after drying my hair. My hair looks shiny and healthy and the product smells great

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried a lot of frizz control products over the years, but this works like a charm

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This smells nice and I love what this brand is doing, but it really didn't do anything for me in the shine or frizz-control department. If you want some perfume for your hair, go for it. But for shine? Meh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell of this stuff is amazing! I use it as a finishing treatment after Im done straightening my hair or curling it, you only need a tiny bit and you can just apply it to your ends. Rub between your hands first to make sure it coats your hair evenly also! Less is more with this oil forsure, which is awesome because for the price, it will last me a longggg time Im sure! (And for reference I have long hair to my waist)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved this! I have been trying to find a good hair oil not heavy or greasy and this was perfect!! Super light and gave my hair a beautiful!

reviews.review_title: love the scent, and it works well for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing to me, a lot like biolage hydrasource. I have no problem using silicone-based products in my hair, but Im always up to trying something newu2014the more the merrier. I do find it adds shine, softness, smoothness and a moisturized feeling. Its not the same sort of softness/shine as silicone-based products giveu2014not better or worse, just different. It gives my hair more of a plump, supple softness than a slick, silky coat sorta feeling that silicone gives. I feel like this is more nourishing for my hair, if anything.   It could be a good second layer on damp or dry hair, after leave-in conditioner and before a silicone serumu2014or just good on its own, after styling for extra gloss, etc. Ive used it on wet/damp and dry hair and it works well on both. It helped my damp hair dry my smoothly and with a nicer wave I think. I have fine-medium lightly wavy hair, and lots of it. Usually my concerns are dryness on the ends, and a bit of frizz.   Ive had this product for over a month, so Ive had a good amount of time to settle my opinion on it. Ill also say that the bottle will last quite a long time; just 3-4 drops per side of my hair seems great (my hair is waist-length).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! Leaves hair looking so healthy and shiny without looking greasy. A must for dry, damaged blonde hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My hair is shoulder length (dark with some lightening on the ends), and fine but also thick. I got this for the shine but also the advertisement in store mentioned it helped your hair over time.   The smell is nice, almost a floral/soap smell (to me) but its subtle enough that it doesnt feel overpowering or like its all you can smell. I use a third of of the tube for my hair (a half left me a little too oily). This does go on and feel like your hair is greasy but after about 5-10 minutes, my hair was normal and youd never know I had put oil on.   Overall, I like this product. I do feel like my hair looks nicer overall since using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Its a nice oil to add some moisture but to be honest, I dont really see a difference in terms of shine. Maybe works better on straight hair, but didnt do much on my curls.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product does add shine. It also smells really nice. Use very sparingly though as a little goes a long way and too much can easily leave hair greasy (but I find this with all shine drops). I do like it better than competing products because its lightweight and doesnt weigh down my fine hair. I left off a star because it can easily make hair look greasy. To avoid a greasy look I focused on the tiniest amount on my ends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very fine, long wavy hair, and most oils weigh it down- but not this one! This oil is super lightweight and doesnt weigh my hair down at all. I use a small amount on dry hair and it makes it very shiny and smoothes down fly aways. Im really impressed with the shine and slip I get from this oil, especially since there are no silicones in it. The fragrance is a very light, clean floral scent that doesnt overwhelm, which is important to me because I hate overpowering scents in my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Its ok. It makes my hair staticky. Still looking for a replacement to Moroccan oil. This is a lot thinner and doesnt control frizz. Its more of a finishing oil. Ill finish the bottle but wouldnt buy it again and definitely wouldnt recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i got this as a sample i've used twice and will be purchasing full size, i applied it to my hair mid to ends when it was 90% dry and my hair hasn't looked this nice in forever. my hair is very damaged and frizzy and this stuff makes it look so much healthier i also have thin hair it doesn't weigh it down or make it look greasy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Considering my hair is bleached, fine and frizzy, I thought this would either weigh it down or do nothing. This is the perfect medium for my hair type: Not greasy, but provides shine and gloss. The smell is divine, but not overpowering. I need two drops, sometimes three, and that's more than enough on my already dried hair. The bottle is gonna last me a LOOONG time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells really nice and fresh. Be careful with how much you apply; it is more of a liquid than a regular oil. Be mindful if you need to apply anti frizz oils as this doesnt help with that and you dont want to much oil post styling treatment. I apply it when my hair is towel dried or if I am not styling and putting it in an updo. Its a fine oil, but I wont repurchase it once I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smells good and I love how it makes my hair look healthy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am still undecided about this oil. I like that it's silicone free, the scent is nice, it's a very light oil that does not feel greasy or weigh down my fine hair, and it gives a little bit of shine. What I don't like is that it does not tame frizz. In fact, it made my hair full of static and more frizzy. I honestly think it's because my hair is not yet used to silicone free products, and it is also winter in the northeast, which means lots of dry air from indoor heat sources. I think this may be a good oil to use in the spring & summer months, and I will try it again then and see if my hair reacts differently to it during the warmer months. Still on the hunt for a clean ingredient hair oil that checks all the boxes.

reviews.review_title: Smells great, then not so much
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells great at first, then fades to a bio oil scent. Yuck. Makes hair shiney initially then fades pretty quickly, like it was never there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: easy 5 stars. love JVN and their ideals around the brand overall. the product smells really nice and 2-3 drops raked through towel dried hair helps make it nice and soft. ill also use a drop run through dry hair to help with frizz before styling! love this with the air dry cream as well makes my wavy hair effortless to style on days that i dont feel like using heat or doing much to it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: before anything , my hair type is straight, filipino hair. Anyways, I love this oil. It's not too heavy and doesn't make hair feel crunchy or greasy . I apply this when my hair is dried after showering . I drop 2-3 drops, rub my hands and run it through my hair but more specifically towards the end. I've noticed less dryness and less frizzles. People even commented how healthy my hair has looked :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Je laime beaucoup, il sent un peu fort sur le moment, mais lodeur sestompe rapidement  Il rend les cheveux doux et enleve les frisottis.  .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It didn't make my hair as shiny as other products but it was lovely and light and great to use with other sulphate and silicone free products. Also smells amazing

reviews.review_title: Did not live up to its standards
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I feel this Hair oil does not moisturize your hair when I put it on my hair it made my hair very dry and it didn't help with frizzy hair I did think it smelled nice also I didn't feel that it made my hair shiny

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Hoped high for this product., disappointed. tried  multiple times, but no improvements. Moving back to my Moroccan leave in treatment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just had to write a review. I love this product for what it does to relieve the frizz from my hair after styling and the fragrance gives my hair the fresh washed smell. This is my new go to hair oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this product. I naturally have straight hair, so therefore it gets oily quicker. BUT, this product made my hair so smoothly, shiny, and lux! Alsou2026 smells fab! This will be a regular product for my lineup after my hair dries after being cleaned!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lodeur est divine, je rechauffe lhuile dans mes mains et ensuite japplique sur cheveux sec, la brillance est instantanee et u00e7a ne semble pas gras. Jadore ce produit, tres bon qualite/prix!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this hair oil!! Made my hair shiny and helped with my frizz. Definitely try it out if you have curly hair. It nourishes the hair without making it look oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love! Light not too oily and a great scent at the right price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this hair oil, it smells amazing!! Truly, I need Van Ness to come out with a perfume that smells exactly like this oil. I find you get a lot of product for the price, and it is a bit of a thinner consistency than other hair oils I've used (VERB ghost oil and Morrocan) but I find it is much more nourishing than the others, which is exactly what I want. I took off a star because I feel like it doesn't last as long as I would hope and have to apply this product a few times a day for the nourishing effect. That could be because my hair really needs it (dry, frizzy, damaged hair) so take what I'm saying with a grain of salt. Otherwise, I recommend you try and see how great it smells.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really like this hair oil! Its consistency is a little thinner than Id prefer, but its lightweight and the smell is very fresh. Definitely brings the shine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first review I've ever left on here, and I felt like I had to because I'm just SO obsessed with this product!!! I'm wondering if the bad reviews are from people that are used to the feeling of silicones in their hair products? I've been on the hunt for something to add slip, shine, and softness to my hair without any silicones in it (very difficult tbh they're in everything and nothing feels quite the same lol) and this is hands down the best thing I've tried so far! I have fine, medium density, wavy hair and I can apply this multiple days in a row without it weighing my hair down or making it feel greasy. A little bit goes a long way too!! Using this together with the complete air dry cream my hair is SO MUCH HAPPIER than it was before switching to these products, and after a week of using the shine drops daily my hair looks + feels healthier than it has in years. I was not sent this product for free, I purchased this with my own money and I'm just leaving this review so people know how bomb this stuff is! also the smell is SO GOOD too okay I'm done now lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It works! The only reason I take a star off is because it vanishes as soon as its on your hands which forces you to use more product than you need. In comparison to NUXE it is much more light weight. Smells amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This didnt change my life but it did do what its supposed to. It smells great and it does make my hair shiny.   The only downside is that theres a fine line between shiny and greasy and its easy to go a bit too far.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Nothing out of this world . Didnt do anything for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like cough medicine & really didnt do much for my hair. On the other hand, I got a gift with purchase of the Shu Uemera overnight serum, boy I love that! Smells amazing & really helped with the frizzies the next morning. Definitely ordering that one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this oil my hair is thick and Frizzy. And this oil did nothing for my hair . The smell is kinda strong but fades. Out over time I didnt see much shine. To my hair will try again just not for my hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Even though my hair looks great when I use it, it does mean I have to wash my hair every day. I'm a wash every third day kinda girl, so I won't be using this. Also, the smell is too much, though it fades quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is definitely the best oil ive tried on my hair, it helps with frizz and makes your hair so soft an shiny! i even use it on wet hair when i get out the shower

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: WOW!! These drops are everything!!! I was having a bad hair day, used dry shampoo and had some frizz going on. As soon as I put these on, my hair felt amazing, it is so smooth and shiny and just beautiful. You outdid yourself JVN!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have recently delved into the world of hair oils and serum to keep my long hair moisturized. So far, I'm a big fan of JVN's line. The shampoo and conditioner has been some of the best I've used and I'm addicted to the pre-wash oil. So when this new oil came out, I was excited to give it a shot. The smell is fantastic. I use this on non-wash days to keep my ends moisturized and it does not weigh down my super-fine hair at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: High quality, smells amazing and never greasy! I even use the oil on my roots with no oily residue

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: WHY DOES THIS SMELL SO GOOD?!  Love this product for my fine straight long hair.  A little goes a long way. 2-3 drops is enough to get my ends sleek, nourished and shiny and smelling like a tropical garden.  Bye dry winter frizz!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Buy this.  Light weight smells pretty makes hair shiny and soft.  I have super fine hair and it works really well for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Didnt really do much, my expectations were high because its Johnathons product. Im going to continue to try it but I like Ghost Oil a lot better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product! It took me a few tries to figure out that it truly only takes a tiny drop to make a big impact. I use this every day because it is so lightweight but gives your hair the full of life look without any effort. Works great no matter how I style my hair or how quick I need a little pop of life in my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
