reviews.review_text: So light and makes my hair so soft and silky! The scent is beautiful, not strong, nice and subtle :) You only need a little bit, a few drops goes a long way, and I have medium to long length hair...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that this is curly girl method safe. I use this on my ends after air drying or diffusing my hair. Beautiful light weight shine and a nice light scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. It definitely is light weight as described. Leaves my hair smooth and it doesnt get that greasy  feel  that other hair oils can leave

reviews.review_title: great for dry mid-shaft and ends
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My bottle arrived after my wash day so I tried this in dry, day 2 hair first. I applied to mid-shaft and ends after using dry shampoo on my roots. I have fine hair that greases out at the crown, but dries out at the ends. This oil is super light and hydrated my heat-styled waves nicely. I use 2-3 drops and only applied to areas that looked dry or rough, never applied above mid-shaft, then gently brushed out, avoiding the crown. I think this would get pretty greasy if I applied it too close to my scalp because of my fine hair texture. Im super happy with this. I paid full price and wasnt provided anything in exchange for my review. Just really like this product. I ordered the scalp oil too based my great experience with this hair oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This does not deliver on what it said.  For the person that said she does not understand all the good reviews, I have figured out that the great reviews are people that are receiving free products and therefore are giving 5 star reviews to keep getting free products.  I will no longer believe any of Sephora reviews for products that are given for free.  If you look at the reviews, you can see a pattern.  Im returning this as deceptive advertising.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried it on dried hair like the instructions say and it was nice lightweight shine. However, when I used it as oil on my washed hair, it turned out amazing. Super soft, and helps my waves become more defined. Very pleasantly surprised!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Is not a bad hair serum but I find that shine/glow is the only thing it provides to my hair. I rather use my Kristin Ess Working Serum which provides more hydration and shine to my curly hair, plus is more affordable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okayyyy, glow on!!! My hair color can look quite flat and become very dry at the the ends and this product is my magic solve for both of those problems! Hair is left shiny/silky looking and hydrated without being greasy plus I love the scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I dont understand the rave reviews. This is fine. It does NOT perform as a hair oil. It does not tame fly aways, frizz, dry ends. It adds a tiny bit of shine to the body of my hair. But I don't feel the nourishment. I prefer a hair oil that actually adds moisture and helps seal the look of my ends. The packaging is super cute. If you have oily hair, you'd probably enjoy this a bit more but if you have SUPER dry hair like me, stick to the Ouai or Olaplex hair oils-those are amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I do not like this at all! I dont understand all the hype! Im debating weather to return it! It definitely doesnt moisturize or tame fly always all it does is add a little glossy shine and thats not much

reviews.review_title: Leaves my hair soft and shiny!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this twice and it makes my hair feel so soft and silky not to mention not frizzy! The smell is pleasant but Im not sure how to describe it, maybe like candy? I have very fine hair and use 2 very small drops on my palm then rub my hands together and run through the middle to the ends of my hair. I do not overuse as it would make my hair very greasy and oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered this as soon as the Sephora app sent me a notification that it had dropped. I have hair bleached white, and get lots of flyaways. Its a short bobbed style. I also have incredibly fine and porous hair. Id been looking for something to help protect from heat styling that would smooth things out and add some gloss. JVN is it! Im not crazy about the scent, but it dissipates pretty quickly. I put 4-5 drops in my palms, rub them together, and work the oil through my hair from tips towards roots, and then smooth down the baby hairs around my part and face. I only wish my hair every 4-5 days, and I havent noticed any greasiness. I also havent noticed any changes in hair color using this (theres some intense toning and maintenance going on between appointments because of this white blonde I have going on!!!).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair
reviews.review_text: Terrible smell and leaves my hair looking ratty. The Gisou Honey Oil and Olaplex are way better and worth the extra $

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: In LOVE with the ease of use for this product as well as the results. Put on after fixing my hair, instantly brought a beautiful perfect shine and helped flyaways get in line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this product, I was reading all the great 5 star reviews thinking it was gonna work perfectly. I like the smell but this does not do anything for my hair, it did not help the frizz or make it shine. It also came half empty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Hate the smell, and honestly does nothing to my hair. I think all the raving reviews are from customers that get free items!! Will be returning mine this weekend! Total disappointment,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: smells soooo good and defintely makes my hair feel soft and shiny without weighing its down

reviews.review_title: A nice to have product to keep down flyways.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is nice to add to my dry ends to keep down the fly-aways, and is also nice to keep down the baby hairs when I put my hair back into a sleek bun. The smell of this product is just not as sophisticated as the smell of the other products in the JVN line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was not expecting to love this product as usually these types of shine products make my fine hair look greasy and weighed down. But wow- not sure what kind of sorcery this is, but one drop made my hair look shiny and less frizzy but no greasiness or oily feeling. It just kinda melts into my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I couldn't wait to try this when I saw it come out. Let's say I have used all brands and this is really different. So super light, I love that. The sent is perfect. It has the right amount of shine. I'd not go crazy with the dropper, I did just to see how much was too much. It is great for frizz. I'm definitely keeping this one in my daily routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It smells like a Glade plug in and its the consistency and quality of olive oil. Switching back to Olaplex. Assumed u201cclean by Sephorau201d also meant fragrance free but guess not

reviews.review_title: A great hair oil that goes a LONG way!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a lovely hair oil to finish off your styling! I have very straight hair and I found that just a couple drops of this was just perfect to finish off a fresh blow dry style to tame a few frizzies and add lots of shine (but not TOO much if you know what I mean). There is a fragrance to this but it's really quite mild and again, just lovely! The only wish I have about this is that it was released during the Summer so I could see how it handles humidity frizz but I'll just have to be patient and try it once it gets warmer again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When this oil cam in the mail I was excited but sort of not expecting anything different then other hair oils Ive used before. I have thin curl hair (3b-3c) hair which while it needs hydration it has to be light weight or  it just will weigh my hair down and make it feel like it needs a wash. Well Johnathan and his team did something truly great with formulation that can be used on my thin curly hair or any other hair texture and truly mean lightweight and give that healthy, not greasy glow. I also used it on my daughter who has straight hair and it worked just as great on her. I tried it by rubbing a few drops in my palms to apply after my curls were styled and dry to break the gel cast and the sine and beautiful clean soft scent  shocked me. I was applying during 2-3 day curls since they can get dry at the ends and it would help with a healthy shiny refresh. After air/ blow drying my daughters hair after wash day it tamed her frizz and again the shine was instant and she loved how her hair smelled. I dont think I can not use this hair oil. I truly enjoy it every time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells absolutely awful. I have color treated coarse hair and this left my hair even drier and frizzier. As much as I wanted to love this is as much as I dont like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After years battling with oil and grease, I never thought I'd purposefully be putting oil in my hair,  but I am amazed at the results. Smoothes out all fly aways and broken edges leaving my hair silky and not brittle. It's extremely lightweight and not greasy. Will definitely be using this for rest of the winter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair
reviews.review_text: These drops really help keep my hair shiny and frizz free without weighing it down! It also smells great :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: amazing overall , logs of shine , don't need much .  it's not greasy or oily.  I have long , thin/medium hair and it's wonderful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good oil that does give shine. You do not need a lot and definitely start out slow. I give this a 4/5 because I do find my hair does look oily the next day and I did try to mostly put the oil on my ends. I do not have very thick hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product made my hair look so vibrant!! I dye my hair constantly so I know it can look dull. I was so excited for this hair oil. It was so light on my hair and yet gave it such a beautiful shine. So pleased with this! I would definitely recommend!!

reviews.review_title: Great JVN Product for dry hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with JVN hair oil shine drops. This product, especially enhanced my dry, thick hair. Everytime I styled my hair , it leaves a natural shine and a great scent too! It does not leave a heavy weigh down whatsoever .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product has been so amazing at taming my frizz! I have thick, wavy hair so frizz and dryness are my biggest hair struggle. Its also very lightweight and doesnt make my hair greasy. I even applied it on a rainy day, and it worked in humidity! Im overall super impressed by that alone because nothing has ever worked for my frizz in rainy weather. I would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not the biggest fan of hair oils since I don't like the feel, but I decided to give it a whirl. It smells amazing and the dropper helped me control the amount I put on my hands. When I put it on my dry hair, it did make my hair shinier, but I still wasn't a fan of how it looked on my waves. Again, that's a personal preference. Does exactly what it says on the box, smells amazing, and I will definitely finish this. Who knows, I might like it more over time. If you love hair oils, give it a try. If nothing else, your hair will smell AMAZING.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product truly makes your hair shine! I only need a few drops, even on my thick hair, and it soften and tames frizz. It does not feel heavy or make my hair greasy. I personally like the smell of this product, the scent is similar to the Pre-Wash oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Another great product from the JVN line. What I love about his products are that they never weigh down my super fine hair. I love these drops because they add a little bit of moisture and shine making it look and feel healthy. It leaves my hair feeling soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My hair is very thin and gets very dry during the winter due to the lack of moisture in the air and all those hot showers. It also becomes frizzier you can see baby hairs sticking out and everything but with this my hair looks so smooth and soft and less dry! It also smells divine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this with my own moneyu2026 The claims are it adds shine and helps frizz, but it didnt do any of that for me. It smells really good like sweet flowers. I used it before and after I styled my hair and it looked the exact same as if I didnt even anything. I tried it on my friends hair too and it just looked greasy. Dont believe all of the crazy great reviews. Try the olaplex bonding oil instead.. that actually adds shine and controls frizz.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Does it add shine? Yes. Does it add nourishment? Yes. Does it add weight? No. I expected the shine but what I loved most about the product was the nourishment. It's hot here in New Orleans so when I pulled my hair up to put it in a bun, I noticed that my delicate hair wasn't feeling as tugged on and I realized it was the drops. My hair wasn't oily or sticky so I genuinely had to think for a minute why there was such a difference. This one is an easy add when you need a little kick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have very fine, thin, straight hair and honestly didnt notice a huuuuge difference. The first time I tried it, I had washed my hair the night before. I used one drop to start with and didnt notice much, so I added two more drops and my hair just looked oily and stringy u2014 huge bummer! I tried this again after using JVN shampoo and conditioner and letting my hair air dry. I used one drop and then lightly touched the dropper with my fingertips, rubbed them together, and applied to the ends and front pieces of my hair. This gave me a much better result, but still not as shiny as I had hoped. I think it helped my ends a little bit, but not as much as some of the other JVN products Ive used. I also think it brought out the color of my hair a bit more, but again, it didnt add the gloss and dimension that I had hoped for, probably because I can only use a very small amount with my hair type. I really want to try it at night before bed when Im not worried about my hair looking greasy, I think my hair would benefit from this product more if I used it that way. I can see this being amazing for thicker hair and hair with waves and curls, but as expected, I had to be very careful with it and dont really feel like I would instinctively reach for this product given my hair type and the subtle results I got. The scent is nice, it reminds me of baby shampoo, I dont think its the most amazing scent, but it is light and not intrusive, which I like.

reviews.review_title: Shiny hair without  any  of  the  weigh  down
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this hair oil consistently for the past two weeks and am loving it. I have thinning wavy hair and dont find that it weighs my hair down at all as i have experienced with other similar products. Its been amazing to use in the winter to help with seasonal dryness as well. Its left my hair very shiny and touchable, plus the smell is a great. Its a bright grape fruit scent that is not overwhelming. Its great to use a  few drops at a time  as well  and add as you go. I've been  able  to use  this on my air dired  waves  in  addition  to styled  blow  outs  as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily, curly hair.  I tried the drops on both wet and dry hair. My hair is soft and full of body now. My husband also used the drops in his beard..and his beard is softer, and has a shine too. I also used them to scrunch into my hair to create more volume, and tighter curls. Very happy with the results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Big miss for me. Didnt add the shine that was advertised and instead weighed my hair down and made it feel greasy. I also wish it smelled more high end. Disappointing product from JVN, I expected more for the price. Drugstore products perform better than this, save your money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am so amazed, this leaves my hair so shiny and silky. Does not leave an oily feel. So obsessed!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I applied this after washing and styling.  When I asked my husband if there was a difference, he said I looked like I had just gone to the salon.  I definitely noticed less frizz and my hair felt very smooth.  While I normally don't like sweet smells in my products, this has a really lovely light floral scent.  It is very easy to apply, but start with just a drop or two to avoid an oily or greasy feeling.  My first time using it, I definitely used too much.

reviews.review_title: Smells great, reduces frizz & adds shine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product left my hair smelling wonderful, created less frizz and added some shine. I'm very low maintenance and this is easy to use and a perfect addition to my hair routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did not purchase this product because I am familiar with the celebrity, just based on ratings and reviews. I was really truly shocked the first time I used this on my hair. My natural colour is quite mousey and flat, so I was surprised how shiny and sleek this made it. I used just a few drops on the ENDS of my DRY straightened hair and it instantly made a huge difference. Truly a good product not just one with a face. I will be trying the mask next!

reviews.review_title: Pretty, but underwhelming for thin hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this, but it was just ok for me. It was extremely easy to use, and the bottle is both aesthetically pleasing and functional. The smell is pleasant (slightly floral with a light musk/oil aspect) and not overwhelming, and the oil isn't too thick. Unfortunately I didn't notice any real difference in my hair- maybe a hint more shine, but no significant frizz control and it made it look a little greasy in all honesty. My individual hairs are pretty thin, so a lot of things are too heavy for it, so that's probably a factor; I can see this being really nice for some with thicker or curly hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with the shine drops! So lightweight and does an amazing job of controlling frizz!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These drops made my hair so shiny and silky! The oil is indeed super lightweight and feels really good when applying through my hair.   I have thick wavy hair and I love the way it defines my waves and makes them more pronounced.   My one desire is that hopefully, they launch different scents! I'd love to try a fruity scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is AMAZING. The smell is amazing and its so light weight. Most oils make me feel self-conscious about my hair but not this one.   Ive been using all JVN since the initial launch and this is an awesome addition.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This saved my dry damaged bleached hair in the front !!! My hair is super shiny and healthy looking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is great! Usually hair oils weigh my hair down and make it look greasy, but this did the opposite! It tamed my frizz well, too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have medium length dark, coarse, wavy/curly hair. I generally use shea moisture products for my hair, but I still have some frizz, and overall my hair isn't very shiny or smooth. this hair oil did wonders. my hair feels softer, looks shiny, and smells so nice. the best part is how light this oil is. I usually hate putting in products after washing but this oil feels natural.  would definitely recommend and will buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product for the feel of lightweight oil, the fragrance, and ending result of shine! Even having a oily scalp the oil doesnt overpower and leaves my hair feeling light and keeping volume!

reviews.review_title: You need this- even if you dont know it yet
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this!  It smells lovely, easy to use  and does wonders.  Also you only use a little so it lasts.  I have lightly curly grayish hair that tends to be dry.  This product smoothed it out and made my curls flow nicely.  I will absolutely stock up on this wonderful find!

reviews.review_title: Leaves your hair shinier longer than other oils!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing hair oil!! Definitely noticed that it leaves my hair shinier for way longer than my other oils. I typically use the Olaplex oil but we all know how small that container is. This oil smells amazing, perfect price for what you get, great ingredients, and leaves my hair feeling/looking shiny. Excited to see the benefits over time. Definitely recommend :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a hairstylist and I started using this on my clients. It gives the hair amazing shine without weighing it down. A little goes a long way though! Just a few drops usually do the trick. I use it after curling my hair to brush through the curls and add amazing shine! Now if you are into big Dolly Parton type hair like myself, I wouldnt recommend using this product too close to the root area as this could take some volume away from your u201chigher the hair closer to Jesusu201d style.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Ive tried a lot of hair oils, and this is by far the most lightweight, and has an amazing clean, light scent. It melts into my hair, and keeps it so touchably soft while making it so shiny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Instant difference. Small amount on my ends and then brushed it through my hair. My hair gets frizzy whether I blow dry or not. However, after using this my hair looked and felt beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: JVN Shine Drops are the answer to my hair issues. Im a frizz ball most days and even after straightening my hair I cant control the frizz or style without my hair having a mind of its own. JVN Shine Drops smell amazing, immediately tamed my mane and left my hair silky smooth and light. I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love. this. product!!! Most hair oils are typically heavy on my hair and make me feel greasy, but the JVN oil shine is so light weight and helps the appearance of smoother, shinier hair! The smell is neutral to moderate and the packaging was so cute. The first photo is my hair before using the hair oil and the second is after using it. It definitely helps with my typical frizzy hair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is light weight ! Does not weigh down your hair and adds such a nice subtle shine. The smell is very light. A little goes a long way

reviews.review_title: Shiny, soft, and healthy hair for days!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These drops are wonderful. I love hair oils but usually they are a bit heavy. This product is not heavy at all. And just a few drops will do the job. I could easily use this everyday. But after even just one use my hair felt so soft and shiny for daaaaaays after!  Not to mention the smell is amazing. Fresh grapefruit smell that is not overpowering like in other brands. I love these drops! Such an incredible deal for the price with great results. Shiny, soft, and healthy hair for days!  *first image is before, second image is after!*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the smell. It brings beautiful shine to my hair tames winter frizz. A little bit does a long way. I found that when I used too much my hair felt oily. I just use one drop now and that has helped.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who doesnt usually use much in the way of hair products, Im so glad I tried this out. It makes my hair look naturally shiny without making it look oily. Its also very easy to apply and smells great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am so glad JVN makes a hair oil now! This made my hair so soft and shiny when I used it and it smells so good. I have some damage on the ends of my hair and this even helped to smooth out that frizz and make my hair look sleek and smooth. Pictures are pre style and post style with the hair oil used after styling.

reviews.review_title: Worth it for the smell alone!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive used so many hair oils and this is definitely 100% my absolute favorite!  It adds shine without being heavy or greasy, helps tame flyaways and a little goes a loooong way.

reviews.review_title: Decent replacement for Gisou Honey infused hair oi
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It has a very nice clean fragrance to it, doesn't way down hair. I have hip length fine hair and I used 3-4 drops. It helps with frizz and add shine without giving a greasy look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My thin/wavy hair is prone to becoming too greasy after using shine products, but JVN Nourishing Shine Drops are lightweight. A little goes a long way (approx. 2-3 drops). My hair never feels weighed down and I absolutely love the light floral scent. The scent is similar to Oribe products (apple/citrus).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This has become my new best friend and a mandatory last step in my haircare routine! The JVN shine oil is SO lightweight and manages my frizz without breaking my curls apart. Makes my hair look so polished; even on days when I don't style my hair. I only need a few drops to make my hair look fabulous!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Where has this been my whole life. Incredible product thats not heavy so hair doesnt get weighed down. Not only does it create shine but de-tangles. Soft shiny hair that I can run my fingers through. Helps with frizz also. I apply this and the air dry cream and my hair transforms into gorgeous luscious bouncy shiny hair. Dont ever stop making this!!! Ever!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! I can't believe the difference! This oil does not weigh down my hair, it reduces frizz and hydrates. I style my hair then put this on last.  My hair feels so much stronger and definitely looks better since I've started the JVN hair care line. This new product is just the icing on the cake and it smells amazing too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This hair oil is lightweight on the hair and does not weigh it down AT ALL! I have straight corse hair and I use about 4-5 drops, it instantly gives my hair a nice healthy looking shine but also helps to moisturize and tame any frizz. It has a scent that is similar to the shampoo and conditioner (I use the Embody collection) which is a light scent that is not overpowering.

reviews.review_title: Multifunctional for me as a new mom!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this product because I already love oil based serums & I was excited to see how JVN compared to other brands. I was pleased to see JVN products including the Shine Drops are vegan, which is important to me. The scent is nice but not overpowering. I love this product. I put it on damp hair after shampooing and conditioning with JVN Nurture Moisturizing Shampoo and Conditioner. I only used the Shine Drops after towel drying. (No other styling products or leave in conditioner). It made my hair feel smooth and moisturized. I went a little overboard and put on a little too much on my ends but even then I didnt feel like it was greasy or weighed down. Im a first time mom of a newborn and I just had my daughter on December 10th so my hair has been getting neglected to say the least! But Ill be using the Shine Drops to keep my hair from tangling, just a few drops on my ends, combing through and throwing it in a braid will help big time. Im excited to keep using Shine Drops! And when I do actually style my hair eventually, Im looking forward to seeing more shine and body in my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These shine drops have quickly become a favorite of mine. At first, I didn't feel like I really needed this step since I would use the JVN pre-scalp oil as a finishing oil and really liked that application. But after using these for a couple weeks now, I am impressed. They are even lighter than the oil and give so much shine and softness to the hair. The best way I can describe it is that it's like all the best parts of silicone without that sticky, slimy feeling you can sometimes get. When I use this, my hair immediately feels softer and smoother, less frizzy, and looks shiny and healthy without feeling greasy or heavy. A little bit goes a long way, too! I have medium-long hair that is relatively thick and dense, and two small drops will do my whole head.   I have loved every thing I've tried in the JVN range (and at this point, I have pretty much everything!). This product is no exception. It's safe to say these drops are now a staple in my hair routine, whether I'm having an easy air-dry day or styling with heat. They elevate any look and make my hair look and feel so healthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It smells nice, is very light but my hair was looking greasy after use and not shiny at all. The day after looks very dry. May not work for everyone. Try to have a sample before you buy! I bought mine & will stay on the bathroom shelf for a long time ...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great hair oil. Smells fresh, doesnt weigh hair. My only comment is I wish it had a pump or spray nozzle (because im lazy and usually freshen up my hair in a hurry) Otherwise, if you are looking for a silicone free touch oil, this worth a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So amazing! The subtle scent is beautiful and the shine is perfect! I use this product every time I style my hair. Its so gorgeous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used hair oil before & it has often left my hair too heavy & I feel like I have lost some of my volume. I love that this product is light, smooth and makes my hair look even healthier!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these drops! They smell really good and really help nourish my hair in-between washes. You can see such a difference when you use them! It's not too heavy in my hair and leaves it feeling soft. Doesn't add any unwanted buildup either!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gals, my hair is so fine, it barely exists. It is also wavy at best(the JVN air dry cream is amazing for a natural wave for me) and puffy at worst. The first time I used this, I used 6/7 drops and went in recklessly. It did leave a light oily look on certain areas. The next time I reduced to four drops and went carefully through the ends first. It was perfect!  My favorite usage is using 2-3 drops to work through a pony tail. I have tried the snatched pony thing and usually end up with a bun because I dont want to have to heat style the puffy pony sticking off my perfectly snatched scalp. This oil allows me to let my pony free without having to put in effort for smoothing/shining :)

reviews.review_title: Buy this my frizzy haired friends!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! This product is amazing! Usually I use about 4-5 products to tame my dry frizzy hair into some sort of semblance that doesnt look like a mound of dog hair removed from a grooming brush after brushing a golden retriever who doesnt have the best nutrition. Now I ONY use this product and my hair is like it belongs to someone else with great hair! I find myself starting at my amazing hair during all my daily zoom meetings! People message me about my gorg hair during said meetings! Thank you JVN! Never stop making this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to love this but it didnt work for me.  Though it feels light weight, a few drops left my fine hair looking quite greasy. It does soften hair and has a nice light fragrance. Perhaps it would work better on thicker hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair
reviews.review_text: This oil smells delicious and creates weightless silliness for days! My hair is in need of a trim, but this oil even smoothes out my frizzled ends.

reviews.review_title: Perfect shine, not greasy! Love this product!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have thin hair that tends to get oily pretty quickly. I have ruined a good hair day by being heavy handed with similar non-JVN products where if I add too much oil my hair gets greasy and is weighed down by the product. I don't have this problem with the JVN Complete Nourishing Shine Drops though! I love this product so much, it delivers a weightless healthy glow and shine in the best way possible. It also helps tame my frizz. A little goes a long way but if you tend to be heavy handed like me that's okay too! Thanks  JVN!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these shine drops. They smell incredible, and they leave my hair super soft and bouncy. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love using products in the winter time that will help manage my frizz and battle the dryness from the cold, dry winter air and this product is my new favorite! I've never used anything quite like this before - it isn't like an oil or serum, it is so much lighter than that. But it feels really substantial in how hydrated my hair feels! I don't heat style my hair, but I do have very wavy hair and so the frizz is so real. And during the winter my ends feel wrecked - this fixes all my problems! Sooo grateful for this product and I definitely recommend for anyone who needs help battling the winter dryness!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This oil is incredible! I have dry frizzy hair but it is thin so many oils can be too overwhelming. This one is lightweight, makes my hair super soft, and tames frizz and flyaways. What up an amazing way to finish your style. Smells great too!!! Try the Instant Recovery Serum too, another winning JVN product.

reviews.review_title: The product I didn't know I needed
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had never heard of shine drops & always stayed clear of anything that said hair oil out of fear it would actually make my hair oily before using this. Now that I've tried it, I think it'll be a new part of my daily routine! It added so much shine to my hair and tamed winter frizz without making my scalp oily. Super, super impressed. I love how easy it is to use. I just put half a dropper's worth in my hands and rub it in my hair from the middle to the ends- it takes only seconds. I included a side-by-side before/after picture just to show how awesome these are! All I did was let my hair air dry after washing it, brushed through it once, and added the drops. It's so effortless and perfect for people who want their hair to look nice everyday with little effort!

reviews.review_title: Tames my straight frizzy hair and winter static
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from JVN in exchange for review, but my opinions are my own. I have long, thick, straight hair that is bleached. I usually use Olaplex Bonding Oil, and this actually feels like a really good dupe for it. It smooths my hair down and makes it very shiny while not being greasy at all. I've actually tried to overapply to see if it ever got greasy or oily looking, and to my surprise it does not! Took off one star because ideally I want it to be a little more moisturizing for winter, but this will be amazing for the warmer months. For now, I'm applying it along with another hair oil to get some extra moisture. I only need 2-3 drops so this bottle will last forever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This oil is amazing. Was so excited when it arrivedi had to try it. Well it was a last day before washing, multiple days of dry shampoo kind of style day. My thin hair often feels dry after using dry shampoo but after using this oil it was back to life. Shiny and silky. Since then I've used it after every style and love how healthy my hair feels and looks. Bonus, it smells fantastic! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: Light, natural hair oil without fillers
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've spent the last several years learning everything I can about hair product ingredients, and I'm really impressed with this oil. It doesn't just coat the hair in a shiny film that needs a harsh detergent to wash out, it actually softens the hair. I have parts of my hair bleached almost white, when this came in the mail I started using it on the super damaged parts of my hair and I definitely notice a difference in softness and shine when I use it. A little bit also goes a long way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didnt think a product like this would be possible. It makes my hair shiny in a super healthy way- and its buildable. I wash my hair every 4 days or so. This stuff made my hair shiny and not greasy. Normally using products make me wash more often, but not this stuff. It didnt mak my hair heavy or greasy, just healthy. I have lighter hair, and have always been envious of people with dark hair and how shiny it gets after heat styling. This stuff makes my hair shiny like that without the heat or the dark color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This oil is INCREDIBLE, not to mention the scent is incredibly addicting! Its perfectly lightweight, almost like a dry oil, but adds shine and softness to the hair. After i style my curled hair with hair spray, mousse, dry shampoo, i am often left with dull, and crunch locks. This oil bring my hair back to life, and then some! It smooths my hair and makes it look and feel super healthy, flexible and frizz is completely gone. I apply from the bas of my neck down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: let me tell you how great these drops are ! First off, they can be used on wet OR dry hair for either more heat protection benefits or, for smooth, light shineeee ! And these drops shine bright. I have long, thick hair and use about 10 drops, working it in from the middle of my strands towards the roots. AMAZING FRESH SMELL, most similar to the JVN air dry cream, if you've ever used that. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These nourishing shine drops are game changing! I have long, frizzy, curly wavy hair that is high porosity and was damaged by toxic products two years ago. My length is still working on recovery so it takes a lot to tame and manage my mane. This is an oil blend like no other and I tried hundreds! It feels so silky smooth and gives shine to my hair I did not know was possible. The drops are lightweight so great for any kind of hair. I like to use it on wet hair to scrunch out the crunch from my gel cast and also on day 2 or 3 if any frizz pops up from working out or sleeping. The smell is incredible- a sweet floral with hibiscus undertones. Scents can trigger migraines for me and nothing in the JVN hair line has.I especially love that this is a styler and treatment in one so my hair looks good the day I apply but it is also helping in the long run. A must have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lightweight oil! Leaves my hair shiny and healthy looking and helps to tame frizz. Doesn't have too crazy or heavy of a scent, which I appreciate and the texture (if you can call it that) is not sticky or too greasy feeling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells sooo good! Love the way it makes my hair look shiny and healthy. I enjoy using this as my last step in my hair routine (after blow drying or styling!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me just say thank the heavens for JVN! This is shine in a bottle, it is the perfect finishing touch to your hair. It leaves your hair shiny, soft and don't get me started on the smell! It smells so clean and fresh. I recommend this 10/10. FYI pic the side holding the bottle has the product on the other is without

reviews.review_title: smells clean and looks shiny? winning.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love many of JVN Hair's products, and the latest is no exception. I am someone who is sensitive to smells and this product smells like a dream, I tell you. A little like warm fresh laundry and just overall a clean scent - I can't stop smelling my hair! It is also effective, and I have super frizzy hair due to years of coloring it. One full dropper smooths my frizzies (yes, that is a word) without weighing my hair down at all. Oh and the shine? Looks like I got a salon job (but I don't even own a hair dryer) so this IS my new fave hair product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily hair and have tried MANY products to tame the frizz, yet each one makes my hair more oily. I was not hoping for much, but since I do love the JVN shampoo & conditioner I thought I would try. It smells fabulous, tames my ginger hair beast, and truly does not leave it oily! I only had to use one drop and it worked fabulously, highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product works great on wet or dry hair and smells incredible! I have really curly hair and sometimes when I use products like this it gets oily and thats not the case! Nice, shiny, and not greasy. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This hair oil is amazing! It's not heavy, it's not oily, it smells great but most importantly, it does the job! With my curly hair, this is the perfect later in the day or day 2 to add shine to my curls -- and managed the inevitable fly-aways that happen with my fine hair. I LOVE it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'll admit I'm already obsessed with this entire line of products. I wouldn't normally use a shine product. But I love this oil, I have naturally oily hair so I was worried - This adds a beautiful weightless shine. It smells amazing as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This works great for heat protection! It smells light and citrusy. I thought my hair would get greasy from this but not at all. I used too much at times and thought my hair looked greasy but it pretty quickly absorbed the extra and looked nice!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this product not only works great but smells fantastic! using vegan and environmentally friendly products is very important to me, and JVN Hair continues to provide wonderful products that check all the boxes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have thick, wavy hair and have never been able to let it air dry with products I have tried in the past. This instantly takes the frizz away and gives my hair that finished salon look. Love how weightless the oil is too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Being blonde in a bottle for most of my life I have longed for shiny, shimmery strands of hair. I have achieved this with other oils, but ended up with greasy roots or weighed down, icky locks. Enter Complete Nourishing Hair Oil Shine Drops!!   These shine drops are so silky, weightless and provide ample amount of shine to my dry, bleach blonde hair. I can live without the smell-but it is very light. I give this product five JVN hair flips any day!!

reviews.review_title: Best hair oil Ive ever used!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fantastic! Couldnt get over how well this worked on my coarse, thick hair. The difference was noticeable as soon as I applied it. Ive tried many hair oils and this one is better than any Ive tried. It has a very light feel thats not heavy or greasy. My hair felt soft and smooth without the feeling weighed down. I have no idea how JVN did it, but this is magic in a bottle. Do not hesitate to try it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: OBSESSED with this hair shine oil. I have been using it for about a week now and I LOVE it so much. It's light enough that it doesn't weigh your hair down and smells so nice.  I usually use a heavier shine oil and I hate how it can weigh down my hair and feel greasy.  This doesn't do that at all.  It keeps my curls, adds shine and helps reduce frizz!  10/10 will be buying this again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are amazing! The Shine Drops are really weightless and help give shine and definition to my curls. I always look for products that enhance my curls not just hold them in place. Plus the citrusy scent makes it even beter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells gorgeous and works beautifully into my hair. I have been using several products to achieve this same effect- its great to have one product thats so effective

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair
reviews.review_text: Love love love this product! As shown in the pictures, that were legit taken minutes apart, this oil creates so much shine to hair that normally looks a little dry and damaged from all the heat tools I use. I am usually hesitant with oil based products as I have had the experience where it makes your hair look greasy but not this! It legit does not go on top of the hair and stay there, but rather soaks into the roots. Highly recommend, plus the environmentally friendly packaging is a plus!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair
reviews.review_text: Literally the first time I used this I could not believe how well it worked! It was instant shine. It left my hair feeling light with a healthy glow. It smells amazing and does not make your hair feel greasy at all. The ends of my hair feel more nourished as well. It really is worth it, especially if you are looking for that extra level of style in your look. I   use about 3 drops into my palms and its the perfect amount. One of my favorite JVN hair products and I use all of them!

reviews.review_buyer_description: gray hair
reviews.review_text: It took some experimenting at first to figure out just how much to use, but once I found the right amount (for my long, wavy, coarse hair that meant about 10 drops, applied to the lengths,) I loved loved loved the end result! This lightweight oil packs a punch. I'm not a big fan of hair products with fragrance, but, like the entire JVN line, these drops have a non-obtrusive, lovely fresh scent that dissipates pretty quickly. I like that they're not just adding shine, they also nourish the hair. My hair feels so soft after using! Left photo is before, right photo is after.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ive never consistently used a hair oil, but I am really enjoying this one. It adds just the right amount of moisture and shine without weighing my hair down! The shine is subtle but I have never received more compliments after using a product! For others who are particular or sensitive to scent - once in the hair the scent diffuses well and is very light. Im not sure its an everyday product for me but definitely enhances my curls when I take the time to do them!

reviews.review_title: Light and nourishing on fine straight hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My hair is silky and smooth, but bouncy and healthy. I have fine hair and was skeptical about this product making my hair flatu2014not at all! Really appreciate the light scent and ease of use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells good in a natural way (not overly scented or perfumy), feels great and makes my frizz disappear. My hair looks so much smoother and feels softer without being greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Oh My GAWWD this is amazing! Makes my hair silky smooth, shiny beyond belief, and helped with my morning poof! Absolutely love, and smells amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product. I will say a little goes a long way. I like that it isn't a thick silicone-based product but instead something that hydrates while also adding shine. This is great for my long straight hair that is prone to frizz in the Florida humidity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This hair oil is PERFECT! Ive used hair oils in the past, but theyve always left buildup and even the slightest bit too much made my hair look greasy. These drops are SO lightweight, it barely even felt like there was any product on my hands. It applies so evenly and doesnt make my hair feel heavy or look greasy at all. It left my hair perfectly shiny. I accidentally went in a little heavy handed at first, but still it didnt even make my hair look dirty at all. It also tamed my flyaways and made my dry winter hair look and feel so healthy and nourished. And the SMELL is STUNNING! Going to be using this regularly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is wonderful! I have used shine oils in the past, this product is not greasy and bring beautiful shine to my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have wavy hair and used this oil to scrunch out the crunch on a wash day. It's the best smelling hair oil I've ever smelled. I took these photos about an hour or two apart, so you can see how it helped smooth out my hair. JVN's team sent me this oil to try out and I'm excited to try it again on my second and third day hair to keep it hydrated. Thanks JVN!! XOX

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So light and not greasy at all. I thought my hair had a lot of shine already, but this made my hair so soft and gave it even more shine. The smell is very pleasant and light.

reviews.review_title: Great hair product, easy to use!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have never tried using anything for my hair other than just simple shampoo/conditioner and was pleasantly surprised by how much I like this product. It makes my hair look nice, smell nice, and feel nice. Would 100% recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These shine drops worked immediately! I have experience using other hair oils and usually are very greasy in the hands. With JVNs drops, they are very light not greasy and immediately added shine to my light hair. Its definitely a product I will continue using and recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was counting down the days until JVN released a hair oil... and this did not disappoint! As a lover of various hair oils, this was immediately added to my wishlist. Not only does it smell amazing, but it truly is weightless and delivers shine! With just a few drops, my hair was more hydrated and shiny immediately. These pictures were taken within minutes of each other and you can immediately see the difference. I can't wait to test it with different hairstyles over the next few weeks. I barely had to use any so I know this bottle will last me all winter. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first experience with hair oils and I must say that I really enjoyed it! The serum itself is not greasy and has a very light scent, which I like because some smells can be overpowering for me. I don't style my hair much, so I use this when my hair is completely dry after a shower, but it gives my hair a nice shine with a soft texture. Additionally, it really helps bring out my curls / waves. Would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The JVN Complete Nourishing Hair Oil Shine Drops is whats been missing from my hair care routine. I love the JVN shampoo/conditioner and Air Dry cream, but my waves were still looking a little frizzy. Now, my hair looks healthy and shiny. I straightened my hair today and it looks better than it has in a long time. I havent had a haircut in 3 months but there isnt a split end in sight.

I adore this product! JVN Shine Drops are a lifesaver for my frizzy hair. Just a few drops of this amazing-smelling balm and my out of control locks are tamed ... softer, curlier and much more manageable. Big fan!

reviews.review_title: As good as you are hoping they are!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These work so well with the air dry cream! Honestly, that's become my every day routine. Add the air dry cream to damp hair for texture and then the shine drops to smooth the ends and any fly aways that have managed to get past the air dry cream. Takes almost no time and my hair looks great. Which is saying a lot, cuz I'm usually a frizzy mess. I love the smell too, which is not how I felt about some of the other smells in this line.

reviews.review_title: Miracle for Anyone Scared of the Idea of Hair Oil
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest review, and frankly, I couldn't be more surprised by it. I FEAR hair oil, full stop. I have a ton of very fine hair that screams in horrir at the idea of adding anything that could possibly make it oily faster. That said, my hair is also box dyed and deep fried and has seen kinder days.   My first thought on opening the bottle? This smells incredible, and I would bathe myself in it. Second thought? Maybe don't use THAT much.   I took the smallest amount on my fingertips and focused on the ends of my hair. I also put a small amount on the lengths and waited, then waited some more, for what I had concluded would be inevitable greasy looking hair. But you know what? It never came. My hair was shiny, but not dirty. It didn't feel weighed down in any way. Just light, magical, mystical, glossy  princess hair vibes in all directions.  I'm so excited about this product. If you fear hair oil like me but are interested in trying something to add a little shine, this is a fantastic choice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair
reviews.review_text: I really like this product! It gives my hair a shine but doesnt turn it greasy because its more like a light liquid rather than a heavy oil. It helps make the ends look more healthy too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love, love, love, Im overdue for a color and tone an put a few drops on after washing and styling my hair and it looks so much sleeker and brighter.  Not greasy and did not weigh my hair down!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was really lucky to receive this product to review for JVN and I couldn't be more pleased with it. I've always wanted to attain that shiny hair look but with my curly hair I could never seem to get a produ t that wouldn't weigh my hair down. These shine drops are incredible and don't add any extra weight to my hair! My hair is shiny all day and smells amazing. I would highly recommend for girls with curly hair who want to add an extra shine! I'll definitely buy it once I run out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Between washes, my hair can get dry and dull. I worked on some of these drops this morning and the shine lasted all day without feeling greasy, looking greasy or weighing down my hair. Adding this to my holy grail of JVN products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves my hair incredibly soft and shiny! It also smells divine. Another holy grail product from JVN!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love. These drops smell so good. I have wavy fine hair and they didn't weigh my hair down at all. I love them

reviews.review_title: Adds subtle shine and controls frizz
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine hair that often gets dull and frizzy in the winter. This helps with frizz and dullness but still subtle and light. Not to mention beautiful packaging! It's not something you need to use a whole lot of, just enough to add shine and control some frizz. A few drops goes a long way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried plenty of oils ranging from thicker clean oils to silicone filled ones. I have to say that this is one of the most lightweight hair oils that I have found. The oil is so lightweight that it almost absorbs immediately into your hands. Its perfect for finer textures that want to add lightweight moisture, shine, and protection. Meanwhile also preserving the bounce and volume of your curls/hair. It has a elegant and powdery scent that smells perfect in your hair! LOVE IT. GET IT. YOU WONT REGRET IT!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was lucky to be chosen by the JVN team to test the new Complete Nourishing Shine Drops. I have been really enjoying using them as the final step in my haircare routine. It makes my hair look super glossy and Shiney but not greasy. It absorbs well into my thick wavy hair while imparting a beautiful finish to my loose curls. When I straighten my hair the Shine Drops make my hair look and feel amazingly soft and shiney. It smooths my flyaways and it smells amazing! A couple drops is all you need so it should last a long time. Overall I am really impressed and I enjoy having it in my haircare routine. I will definitely repurchase when I run out.
